thread.title: St. Louis Cardinals-Chicago Cubs in NLDS Game 3: What TV channel, live stream, live updates
thread.title_full: St. Louis Cardinals-Chicago Cubs in NLDS Game 3: What TV channel, live stream, live updates | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: St. Louis Cardinals-Chicago Cubs in NLDS Game 3: What TV channel, live stream, live updates
text:
The St. Louis Cardinals and Chicago Cubs resume their best-of-five National League Division Series with Monday's Game 3 in Chicago.
Follow live inning-by-inning updates as Jake Arrieta tries to give the Cubs a 2-1 series lead:
Here are details on how to watch and listen to the game online:
What : St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs in NLDS Game 3. The series is tied 1-1.
Where : Wrigley Field, Chicago
When : Monday, October 12, at 3:07 p.m. PT/6:07 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : St. Louis' Michael Wacha vs. Chicago's Jake Arrieta
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
